data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Mashonaland West.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mashonaland West, Zimbabwe
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Mashonaland West, Zimbabwe a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary: On average, 60 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Mashonaland West, Zimbabwe.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Mashonaland West that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Mashonaland West, Zimbabwe and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Doma, Vadoma people. Make the Doma, Vadoma people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Mashonaland West against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Mashonaland West, Zimbabwe to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 320,450 believers in Mashonaland West, Zimbabwe a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Mashonaland West
location.people_groups_list: Tshara-Tshao, Han Chinese, Mandarin, Dombe, Gujarati, Marathi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tshara-Tshao (4,400), Han Chinese, Mandarin (1,500), Dombe (6,800), Gujarati (30,000), Marathi (6,600)
